coded_answer.p: I received your letter last mondayMonday. I want to say thank you that I wasfor making me the lucky person who won that competition. It will be a great opportunity for me to see the United States and I am so happy about that, I can notcannot explain it.

You want to know some further information from me. About the date, when I want to travel, can I say that it is only possible for me onin July because I have to do some exams at the school. I would prefer toregarding the accommodation at the campRegarding the accommodation at the camp, I would prefer a tent, the. The reason is that I like to live realyreally naturalnaturally and it is more enjoyable to live in a tent thenthan in a cabinscabin.

AsRegarding activities, I can say that I like every sport, but basketball and tennis would be perfect for me. In basketball I have had more practisepractice thenthan in tennis. I play every weekend onin competitions with my local team and about tennis it is that I tried but it is not like my basketball experience.
Also I want to know how muchmany clothes and how much money I wouldwill need for these two weeks. Please write to me with your answer as quickquickly as possible.
I hope I can hear from you soon.

How are you my lovely penfriend? I hope goodwellWell, I hope. You want to know how was itit was to work and help at a pop concert? It iswas marvelousmarvellous. You see the stars so near and also you can chat with them. On my first day I shouldhad helpto help to bring the staffstuff for the band, things like guitars, drums and othersother things. It was maybe hard work for a while but I was so happy about that to help onat a realreally big pop concert I can't decribedescribe it. On the other two days I helped to prepare the breakfast, lunch and dinerdinner for the band. You are always so near to these people and after a while it is normal to stay and chat with Brian Adams, for example. I realyreally enjoyed that and it was one of the greatest, whenif not the greatest experience inof my life. On the other hand it was a good paidwell paidwell-paid job withat 15 pounds per hour, what. What do you cancan you say.!

The organizer of the tournementtournamenttour have spokenspoke with me and asked me if I wantwanted I could doto do the same work in two months at the concert by the Rolling StonesRolling Stones concert is. Is that notIsn't that fantastic.! I couldn't believe it but he gave me the contract to fill it outto sign. I hope, Kim, you waswere not too jealous about that, sorry. Please write to me soon,. I'm waiting.
